channel.title: Need an experts help here!
channel.description: Hi I have a few problems, here is one: i got tos-scape v2, and when you die you DONT lose your items, it just takes them off you, and puts them in inventory. Please help make it so when you die u lose ALL items? PLEASE HELP ME! Thanks! The other is how do i take the ghost away when you die? Please help me!! Thanks!

item.title: Need an experts help here!

item.description:
@n00b_pl0x wrote:

Well, ghost thing worked, but dien thing didnt. Please somebody this is really important

item.title: Need an experts help here!
item.dc:creator: @wazup wazup
item.description:
@wazup wrote:

um ghost one go down to public class client extends Player implements Runnable { most be sumtin bout ghost der… delete it … um search for like ghost in client.java i wuld try deleteing ghost sutff

and for da dieing thing umtry finding /*PKING VOIDS FROM CHEEZSCAPE*/ in client.java go down till u see sumtin i hope like //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } above da //teleportToX = 3254; add removeAllItems(); so it like removeAllItems(); //teleportToX = 3254; //teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you are dead!"); setSkillLevel(3, 99, playerLevel[3]); currentHealth = 99; hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } shuld work i got dat stuff from project MAKE A BAKUP

item.title: Need an experts help here!
item.dc:creator: @n00b_pl0x n00b pl0x
item.description:
@n00b_pl0x wrote:

Hi I have a few problems, here is one:
i got tos-scape v2, and when you die you DONT lose your items, it just takes them off you, and puts them in inventory. Please help make it so when you die u lose ALL items? PLEASE HELP ME! Thanks!
The other is how do i take the ghost away when you die? Please help me!!
Thanks!

Read full topic
